title: Sandhoff disease study shows proof of principle for gene therapy

title_detail.value: Sandhoff disease study shows proof of principle for gene therapy

summary: Researchers studying a fatal childhood genetic illness called Sandhoff disease uncover new details about how it develops in utero that indicate gene therapy has potential.

summary_detail.value: Researchers studying a fatal childhood genetic illness called Sandhoff disease uncover new details about how it develops in utero that indicate gene therapy has potential.
